name: Crazy Sweet Sugar Shop Ninja Crush XD - An Awesome Chopping Game for Kids
name_original: Crazy Sweet Sugar Shop Ninja Crush XD - An Awesome Chopping Game for Kids
description:
Crazy Sweet Sugar Shop Ninja Crush XD - An Awesome Chopping Game for Kids is an arcade game developed by Mekamax. It was originally released in 2014. Mekamax published the game.
Crazy Sweet Sugar Shop Ninja Crush XD - An Awesome Chopping Game for Kids is available on iOS.
